name: Chew – Video Embed Shortcode
author: Ben Bowler

sections.description: Chew is a Live and VOD platform for Artists, DJs and Labels. With this plugin you can embed Chew videos into WordPress with one simple shortcode. [chew video=”XXXXXXXXXX” height=”500px” width=”300px” autoplay=”yes”]
sections.installation:
To install the plugin simply

  1. Upload the plugin zip file or install from the ‘Add New’ plugins interface
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [chew video="XXXXXXXXXX" height="500px" width="300px" autoplay="yes"] in any post replacing XXXXXXXXXX with your Chew.tv video id (found in the url of the video page)
sections.changelog:
0.4

  • Fixed code when autoplay is used

0.3

  • Added support for live events and channels

0.2

  • Submitted to WordPress.org
